## Overview

<img src="images/autoCaretlogo.png" id="overview-image" width=200 height=100 align="right"/>

[autoCaret](https://github.com/gregce/autoCaret) is a tool for helping business analysts and other enthusiats to understand how to begin building predictive models in R. It provides a interactive graphical interface for performing "auto modeling" for binary classification problems and is based on the underlying features and functionality provided by both the `caret` and `caretEnsemble` R packages. 

## Getting started

To install **autoCaret** from GitHub:

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("gregce/autoCaret")
```

The RStudio IDE includes integrated support for using autoCaret as an add-in. with profvis. These features are available in the current [Release of RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/).
